laboratory_examinations.findings: TSH at baseline was within normal limits.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: After 18 months, TSH was low at 0.13 µIU/ml (range=0.35-5.50); follow-up showed normal results at 0.72 µIU/ml.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Baseline free T4 was normal at 0.7 ng/dl (range=0.9-1.8).
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Follow-up showed normal free T4 results at 1.0 ng/dl.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Total T3 level was normal at 1.32 ng/ml (range=0.60-1.81).
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Follow-up showed total T3 level at 1.16 ng/ml.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Blood pressure was measured at 200/120 mm Hg; after medication adjustment, it decreased to 193/94 mm Hg.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Blood pressure remained elevated during treatment, with repeated measurements consistently high.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Non-fasting blood glucose level was 196 mg/dl; after medication adjustment, it decreased to 147 mg/dl.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Blood glucose levels showed a decrease after administration of missed medications.
